thread.title: West Ham fans sing a new version of the "We've got Dimitri Payet" chant - it's VERY sweary

author: Thomas Bristow
title: West Ham fans sing a new version of the "We've got Dimitri Payet" chant - it's VERY sweary
text:
West Ham fans create and sing new profanity filled "We've got Dimitri Payet" chant The words were very different a year go... Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now West Ham fans come up with new Payet chant Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
On Thursday Slaven Bilic revealed that West Ham star Dimitri Payet has handed in a transfer request and is refusing to play. 
The man who had made himself a Hammers legend in the space of season, made himself an Irons enemy in just a few minutes. 
Since the news broke supporters have called for the Frenchman to leave and stadium security even placed a guard in front of his London Stadium poster. 
And just prior to West Ham's home game against Crystal Palace, fans took to tainting the 30-year-old's famous "We've got Payet chant." A steward guards the Dimitri Payet of West Ham United sign outside the stadium (Photo: Getty Images) 
As seen in the video above, Hammers fans in their numbers joined in for a chorus of the newly dubbed "F*** off Payet". West Ham fans create new Payet chant (Photo: Twitter/@WestHamFCLive) 
And it goes: "F*** off Payet, Dimitri Payet, We just don't want you anymore, You've got some f*
